amendment.description: Page 282, line 11, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $10,000,000)". Page 283, line 3, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $20,000,000)". Page 296, line 7, after the dollar amount, insert "(increased by $10,000,000)".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 108 printed in House Report 115-297 to provide funds for the support of Juvenile Justice.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Cohen amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A108) offered by Mr. Cohen.
